objects.text: • GENUINE LEATHER • CHROME LEGS • PREMIUM COMFORT

product_details.name: Modern Luxe Leather Sofa - Premium Mid-Century Living Room Centerpiece
product_details.description:
• Genuine brown leather upholstery with premium finish
• Sleek chrome-finished metal legs for modern aesthetic
• Spacious 3-seater design with generous depth for maximum comfort
• Clean-lined silhouette perfect for contemporary living spaces
• High-density foam cushioning for lasting support and comfort
• Durable frame construction for long-term stability
• Easy-to-clean leather surface resistant to daily wear
• Ergonomic armrests and backrest design
• Elevated design with raised platform for easy cleaning underneath
• Perfect blend of comfort and sophisticated style
• Includes decorative throw compatibility for style customization
• Ideal dimensions for both compact and spacious rooms
• Professional assembly recommended for optimal setup

banner_details:
This banner design presents a sophisticated, modern aesthetic ideal for luxury furniture promotions. The central focus is a realistic product image labeled as "product_image", placed over a soft radial circular background for emphasis. Above this, two primary typographic layers, "heading" and "subheading", use bold sans-serif and elegant serif fonts respectively, reinforcing the premium brand image. A circular gradient accent at the right draws attention to the "price" text layer. Below, the features are outlined in the "description" layer. A prominent "cta" button, styled with a semi-opaque box "cta_background", encourages interaction. 

**Color Palette**:
- Background: #2D1E18 (Dark Brown)
- Accent Beige: #D7CCC8
- Muted Bronze: #A1887F
- Highlight Cream: #EFEBE9
- Text Dark: #2D1E18
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek, minimalistic aesthetic blending warm and neutral tones to create a cozy and elegant look. The rich cognac brown leather sofa (Hex: #8B5A2B) is the focal point, exuding warmth and luxury. A soft cream throw (Hex: #F5F1E5) draped over the armrest introduces a touch of comfort while contrasting gently with the sofa. The light beige wooden coffee table (Hex: #E8D8BE) complements the setting, enhancing the earthy palette. Subtle shadows and matte textures unify the color scheme, while the white cup and saucer (Hex: #F4F1E7) add minimal yet striking highlights. Ideal for calm, modern ad campaigns.
